alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:49PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Brown, southern Waupaca, southern Oconto, Outagamie and eastern Shawano Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 848 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front associated with strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gillett to near Shawano to near Navarino Wildlife Area to 6 miles northwest of Black Creek to Waupaca. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong windss will be near... Gillett and Navarino Wildlife Area around 855 PM CDT. Black Creek around 905 PM CDT. Pulaski and Fremont around 920 PM CDT. New London around 925 PM CDT. Green Bay and Bellevue Town around 930 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mackville, Leeman, Northport, Sugar Bush, Rose Lawn, Freedom, Ledgeview, Wolf River Bottoms Wildlife Area, Leo Frigo Bridge and Medina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Outagamie; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca
